#summary Some code examples

== Basic ==

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt/Crypt.php';

$crypt = new Crypt();
$encrypted = $crypt->encrypt('my test');
echo $crypt->decrypt($encrypted);
?>
}}}

== Advanced ==

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt/Crypt.php';

$crypt = new Crypt();
$crypt->Key  = '!@#$%&*()_+?:';
$crypt->Mode = Crypt::MODE_HEX;
$encrypted = $crypt->encrypt('my test');
echo $crypt->decrypt($encrypted);
?>
}}}

or

{{{
<?php
require_once 'Crypt/Crypt.php';

$crypt = new Crypt(Crypt::MODE_HEX, '!@#$%&*()_+?:');
$encrypted = $crypt->encrypt('my test');
echo $crypt->decrypt($encrypted);
?>
}}}
